item.title: E-CTF - Forensics - I Can Do This All Day
E-CTF - Forensics - I Am Groot
item.description: Forensics - I am Groot - writeup Once I tried to dm the bot directly with: !groot rocket I get 01001001 00100000 01100001 01101101 00100000 01000111 01110010 01101111 01101111 01110100 00100001 Lets convert that binary to ascii that is binary and coverts to I am Groot! Once i try to dm the bot with: !groot pascal I get : SSBhbSBHcm9vdCE= That is base64 and translates to: I am Groot! Lol
